SVG Fonts workflow:
===================
1. Generate the google fonts url using only the characters needed aka:
https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Sans+Pro:400&text=update_account_settingsalways()uridashboard

2. Go to that url and get the gstatic url aka:
https://fonts.gstatic.com/l/font?kit=HI_SiYsKILxRpg3hIP6sJ7fM7PqVP-HRvMcd00CVU2Wxx6ouLhV0APfx1k8gtG2j5Q&skey=d94d317bc78fd84e&v=v7

3. Go to that url and download a .woff2 file

4. Input that .woff2 file into https://www.giftofspeed.com/base64-encoder/

5. Copy the base64 and paste it into the svg's @fontface declaration aka:
@font-face {
  font-family: Source Sans Pro;
  src: url(data:font/woff2;base64,);
}
